vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Specific Use Permit No. 502 for a private recreation center, club, or area on property zoned an R-16(A) Single Family District on the south line of Dilbeck Avenue, east of Preston Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a revised site/landscape plan and revised conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised site/landscape plan and revised conditions
Z212-241(RM)
